name: Choose Your Own Pathway: Lost in the Stacks
name_original: Choose Your Own Pathway: Lost in the Stacks
description:
Choose Your Own Pathway: Lost in the Stacks is an educational adventure game developed by cublibraries. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play Choose Your Own Pathway: Lost in the Stacks on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
